abstract: Odd tax credit for buyers of luxury boats emerges as one of thousands of items packed into New York State Gov Andrew M Cuomo's $150 billion budget; tax break stipulates that buyers of boats valued at more than $230,000 will not have to pay sales tax beyond that amount, regardless of price; proponents argue that clause will create jobs.
lead_paragraph: Of the thousands of items packed into Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s $150 billion budget for New York State, one in particular seemed to float to the top: a tax credit for buyers of luxury boats.

headline.main: Shopping for Yacht? New York Budget Offers a Tax Break
headline.print_headline: Shopping for Yacht? Deal in Albany Offers a Break

snippet: Of the thousands of items packed into Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s $150 billion budget for New York State, one in particular seemed to float to the top: a tax credit for buyers of luxury boats.
